oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Collection of documents related to Col. George Washington McKenzie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These documents include a printed sheet recommending Gen. A.P. Stewart to serve as the commander of the United Confederate Veterans Association, the envelope that was mailed to him and a letter from W.G. Allen requesting information about Confederate soldiers from Rhea and Meigs Counties. George Washington McKenzie served as colonel of the 5th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA which was partially recruited in Rhea and Meigs Counties. Col. McKenzie was from Meigs County, Tennessee.
